definition.text: You have successfully created your profile! You are now set up to participate in all the various Governance Programs!

paragraphs.text: The Onboarding Programs are your first stop into the world of Superalgos governance. So letâ€™s add them to your profile!
Find the Token Power Switch node under the User Profile node and click Add Onboarding Programs on the menu.
The Onboarding Programs node should pop up as an offspring of the Token Power Switch.
